view.title: Ireland
view.desc: Rapid economic development, good air quality, beautiful environment, food safety, has a long history, high level of education.

p1.text: Located on the northwest coast of Europe

p2.text: 70,273 square kilometers, accounting for about 5/6 of the southern part of the island

p6.text: Ireland's natural environment is well maintained, the country's tree-lined, river aspect, air purification index of the world's top five, is one of the world's most pure countries. Surrounded by the sea, is a typical temperate maritime climate, abundant rainfall rich vegetation, beautiful natural environment, "Emerald Island" reputation

p7.text: Ireland has a complete education system, followed by traditional British education, many world famous schools, primary and secondary schools free education, 85% of local people to complete higher education

p8.text: Business, such as Microsoft, Google, Amazon, eBay, Yahoo, Facebook, Twitter and other high-tech companies are headquartered in the United States, the United States, the United States, the United States, the United States, Ireland; per capita GDP 53,313 US dollars (US $ 7,485)

p9.text: The medical level is well known worldwide and has perfect social welfare, free public health care system, social welfare includes work benefits, child and women welfare, unemployment support, rent subsidy and national fuel plan

panel2.desc: 1 million euros for suburban townhouse, about 5 to 6, 1 to 2 sets of downtown, tenant is government, return the rent about 6.5% per year, you can also choose five years after the principal even rent returns to investors, will give away family immigrants.

p1.text: Social housing is affordable accommodation for low-income people who are unable to rent; local authorities and housing intermediaries represent housing provided by the Irish government; social housing accounts for 10% of all Irish housing.

p2.text: The Chinese investor's guaranteed property is leased to the government for a long time; the social housing project is spread throughout the Republic of Ireland; the minimum amount of investor investment is â‚¬ 1000,000.

p3.text: Sean Sheahan will act as an advisor to the company on behalf of the investor; Alvaro Blasco will act as the trustee of the investor; Sean Sheahan will oversee Alvaro Blasco's operations and report to the investor; the company and Sean Sheahan sign Service agreement, by Sean Sheahan responsible for providing all services.

p1.text: Do not need education, language, management experience, immigration supervision and other requirements;

p2.text: No physical examination, interview, business exam, do not explain the source of funds;

p3.text: The minimum application period is only four months

p4.text: After the approval of investment, investment projects approved by the government and recognized, security and security of funds;

p5.text: After obtaining the immigration status, the applicant may choose to reside in Ireland, free study, work, investment and life;

p6.text: Ireland passport free access to 173 countries and regions, including the United States, Canada, Britain, France, Germany, Italy, Australia and Hong Kong and other developed countries and regions;

p7.text: Irish citizens can study, work and live in any EU country and pay tuition fees in accordance with EU student standards;

panel4.p1: (1)The main applicant is 18 years of age, non-EU citizens
panel4.p2: (2)Applicants are legal spouses and children under 18 years old or 18-24 years old single, economically independent children
panel4.p3: (3)Investment projects must be approved by the Irish government
panel4.p4: (4)The investment period is at least 3 years
panel4.p5: (5)At least 500,000 euros can be used for project investment funds
panel4.p6: (6)Provide proof of assets of 2 million euros
